Main.Title: Welcome To The Wildlife Of Sri Lanka
Main.Description: One one the most beautiful places to ever exist sure to leave you astonished

Body.Title: Endangered animals
Body.Description1: Even though Sri Lanka famous for its wildlife there are number of wild animal species that are threatened with extinction because of human behaviors.
Body.Description2: Same time there is threatened flora and fauna to extinct.

Body.Title: Indeginous animals
Body.Description1: Sri Lankan junglefowl, Purple-faced langur and Sri Lanka blue magpie are
Body.Description2: some of common endemic animals that can be observed.

Body.Title: Threats to Wildlife
Body.Description1: Deforestation and habitat destruction in Sri Lanka's rainforests pose a significant threat to the country's rich biodiversity, which includes a diverse
Body.Description2: range of ecosystems and unique flora and fauna.
